nodes.documentation:
Transfer ions
	 * Send `_value` ions to `_to` from your account
	 * @param _to The address of the recipient
@param _value the amount to send
nodes.name: transfer
transferFrom
transferBetweenPublicKeys

nodes.documentation:
Set allowance for other address
	 * Allows `_spender` to spend no more than `_value` ions in your behalf
	 * @param _spender The address authorized to spend
@param _value the max amount they can spend
nodes.name: approve
approveAndCall

nodes.documentation:
Destroy ions
	 * Remove `_value` ions from the system irreversibly
	 * @param _value the amount of money to burn
nodes.name: burn

nodes.documentation:
Destroy ions from other account
	 * Remove `_value` ions from the system irreversibly on behalf of `_from`.
	 * @param _from the address of the sender
@param _value the amount of money to burn
nodes.name: burnFrom

nodes.documentation: @dev Buy ions from contract by sending ether
nodes.name: buy

nodes.documentation:
@dev Sell `amount` ions to contract
@param amount The amount of ions to be sold
nodes.name: sell
_transfer
_mint
